participant_1.background:
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
i sing in the shower.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
my wife is a college professor.
regular life disappoints me.

participant_2.background:
I loved playing with my dog as a child.
I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.

content.text: Hey! What are you doing today?
I am just doing some research on scuba diving.
That is really cool! I have never been scuba diving before but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! I love the feeling of being underwater and exploring the ocean.
I bet it is amazing! I am not much of a swimmer but I would love to try it sometime.
You should definitely try it! It is a great way to get out and see the world.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, spend time with my family and friends, and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to play music too. What kind of music do you like to play?
I mostly play guitar and sing. I like to play a lot of different genres of music but I am really into country music right now.
That is awesome! I love country music too. I play the piano and sing. I mostly play classical music but I also like to play some country music.
That is so cool! I would love to hear you play sometime.
I would love to play for you! I am always looking for new people to play music with.
Great! We should definitely set something up.
